43088.summary: Some customers in the East Kildonan area of Winnipeg are experiencing an interruption to Internet, Television and Home Phone services. We are working to restore service as quickly as possible and apologize for any inconvenience this may cause.
43088.title: Oct 17 – Winnipeg (East Kildonan) | All Services - Outage (Resolved)
